title: RULE APPROVAL – HOUSE AGRICULTURAL AFFAIRS COMMITTEE – States findings of the Legislature and provides that all temporary and pending rules of the Idaho State Department of Agriculture, the Idaho Sheep and Goat Health Board, the Division of Occupational and Professional Licenses, and the Idaho Oilseed Commission have been reviewed and approved by the House Agricultural Affairs Committee.
subject: AGRICULTURE

actions.description: Introduced, read first time, referred to JRA for Printing

Read second time; Filed for Third Reading
